text: "Please Me" is a song by American rapper Cardi B and American singer Bruno Mars. It was released on February 14, 2019. It reached number three on the Billboard Hot 100 in the US. It is their second collaboration after the remix of Mars' song "Finesse", which also reached number three in the US. == References == Category:2019 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:Bruno Mars songs Category:Cardi B songs
title: Please Me
